Text.Page: I won't give up hope. Look at all these people working to bring back life. Real life, not argon life.
I don't know how you're going to feel about this... But I think we're the only surviving faeries in this region.
This used to be a nice neighborhood... Until those monsters turned up from who-knows-where!

They're called argons, right? They attach themselves to the creatures here and become a part of them.

That's why the bears attacked people. Normally they wouldn't.
I really don't know. Cheniel still wants to go through with the restoration... But could we really live here again even after it's restored?
